comments:
Using RC4 and the latest EMF build.

Right click a genmodel, select Reload ..., click Next, NPE

Here is the stack trace ... if you need my workspace, let me know and I'll put
it where Ed can get to it.

If the used genPackage of a genPackage doesn't exist, the refence
genPackage.getUsedGenPackages(0) returns a broken proxy.  In this case, the
getEcorePackage() of the broken proxy returns null.

The method now checks if the ePackage is null to avoid the NPE.

The fix is committed to CVS.
